title: @KateyKhaos  Secret agent skins and ward...
body: Do you have any thoughts on more secret agent skins? and if there are more, what about a ward skin that is a security camera? I feel like that could go with the whole spy motif. Thanks for your time.

replies.body: I think it's cool to continue the line - not entirely sure if I have anyone on my mind who'd be a good call. I think the idea of the ward would be wicked cool, though!

Double Agent Kled (THEY'RE ALL ENEMIES) Also Skaarl in a suit and the black sunglasses.

Secret Agent Tahm Kench (if caught, he eats the evidence!)

Secret Agent Ekko (what better way to get out with secrets than just rewind time?)

I think that'd be really cool. I mean Imagine Secret Agent Vayne and Special Agent Jhin(since Jhin only has one skin currently and I don't know many ADC mains who pay the 1350 for the High Noon). The Mecha Ward kinda already looks like a camera though so not sure about that one, but I'd be hyped to see more diversity in champ skins.

Jhin got a skin 9 months ago when he came out. Champions very typically do not get several skins within a year of each other, with notable exceptions being the E-Sports skins, which are independent of the skin schedule.
